This has to be one of those days where you're like "Damn, I'm glad I decided to be a cop."

topics.body:
*reads the top message on the forum*


I just had a interesting random thought; why is that always that in general for most sites the people that apply to be moderators are 90% just crap?  I'm obviously not talking about current site staff, but I mean as in the people that apply to be moderators to sites?

90% of the time the sorts of people you get applying to be mods for sites, obviously they never get the position but, are the people that go:
"M@ke m3 m0d pl0x thx!"
"Have you read the rules?"
"No"
"How do you intend to carry out the rules if you don't know them?"
"B@n anyone who argues with me"
"How do you judge if someone should be banned?"
"If they disagr33 wit me they gut perm@b@nned"
"You're not becoming a mod"
"Fuck you!"

Random animal fact, but alligators and that are one of the few types of animals that have sex cause they enjoy it.  The reason why it didn't kill him is that probably when he started she enjoyed it.

Side note: I would massively have to dissuade anyone from trying to see if this is true though cause a alligator tail can break bones so it's version of "no" would be to break your ribcage.
